sourcesContent:
/**
 * Dashboard Page Component
 * Basic layout - we'll add content step by step
 */

import React from 'react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import {
  Container,
  Typography,
  Box,
  Grid,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  CardActions,
  Button,
} from '@mui/material';
import Layout from '../components/Layout';
import { authService } from '../services/authService';

const Dashboard = () => {
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  // Redirect if not authenticated
  React.useEffect(() => {
    if (!authService.isAuthenticated()) {
      navigate('/login');
    }
  }, [navigate]);

  return (
    <Layout>

      <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 4 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
          Dashboard
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant="body1" color="text.secondary" sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
          Welcome to MandirSync! Your temple management system is ready.
        </Typography>

        <Grid container spacing={3}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Card>
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                  ðŸ’° Donations
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                  Record new donations and view donation history
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button
                  size="small"
                  variant="contained"
                  onClick={() => navigate('/donations')}
                >
                  Go to Donations
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>

          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Card>
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                  ðŸ“Š Reports
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                  View daily and monthly collection reports with breakdowns
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button
                  size="small"
                  variant="contained"
                  onClick={() => navigate('/reports')}
                >
                  View Reports
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>

          <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
            <Card>
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                  ðŸ‘¥ Devotees
                </Typography>
                <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                  View and manage devotee information and donation history
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button
                  size="small"
                  variant="contained"
                  onClick={() => navigate('/devotees')}
                >
                  View Devotees
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Container>
    </Layout>
  );
};

export default Dashboard;
